docs.text: Notifiarr Regex to filter Indexer/Tracker for Prowlarr etc health notifications You can add the following Regex in Options > Health check exclusion. This Regex will filter the notifications, so only the ones for chosen Tracker/Indexer, or if all of them are offline. ^(?!((all[ ]indexers)|(indexers[ ]unavailable.*(Indexer1|Indexer2)))).*$ I haven't tested this in combo with the Database/Corruption notifications, as i don't use them with PGSql
docs.title: Notifiarr

docs.text: You can add the following Regex in Options > Health check exclusion. docs.title: Regex to filter Indexer/Tracker for Prowlarr etc health notifications
